utest.Runner

type
class
available in
neko, php, flash9, flash8, flash7, flash6
The Runner class performs a set of tests. The tests can be added using addCase or addFixtures. Once all the tests are register they are axecuted on the run() call. Note that Runner does not provide any visual output. To visualize the test results use one of the classes in the utest.ui package.

Constructor

new()
Instantiates a Runner onject.

Instance Variables

length(default,null) : Int

The number of fixtures registered.

onComplete(default,null) : Dispatcher<Runner>

Event object that monitors when the runner ends. This event takes into account async calls performed during the tests.

onProgress(default,null) : Dispatcher<{ totals : Int, result : TestResult, done : Int}>

Event object that monitors the progress of the runner.

onStart(default,null) : Dispatcher<Runner>

Event object that monitors when the runner starts.

Instance Methods

addCase(test : Dynamic, ?setup : String, ?teardown : String, ?prefix : String, ?pattern : EReg) : Void

parameters:
test: must be a not null object
setup: string name of the setup function (defaults to "setup")
teardown: string name of the teardown function (defaults to "teardown")
prefix: prefix for methods that are tests (defaults to "test")
pattern: a regular expression that discriminates the names of test functions; when set, the prefix parameter is meaningless
Adds a new test case.

addFixture(fixture : TestFixture<Dynamic>) : Void

getFixture(index : Int) : TestFixture<Dynamic>

run() : Void
